# Brilliant Aura (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]], [[8th Level Druid Spells|Druid 8]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 15]], [[BoXM 15th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 15]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** Weapons carried by one creature/2 levels, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless) 

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 39

*Taking fresh insight from contemplation of light, you cast the spell and set your allies aglow with white brilliance.*

This spell functions like *[[Brilliant Blade (Spell)|brilliant blade]],* except as noted here, and that all weapons of the subject creatures gain the [[Brilliant Energy (MagWpnSpcAb)|brilliant energy]] special ability.
